meaningMnemonic: You can <radical>branch</radical> out your <radical>fingers</radical>. It's your special <kanji>skill</kanji> that requires some good <kanji>technique</kanji>s. Your fingers branch out into smaller fingers and you can hold things really well. You can type super-duper fast. And you can win any tickle fight. These are skills you have thanks to your branching fingers.
readingMnemonic: Unfortunately, these <kanji>skill</kanji>s are too much for the normal skill-less people to handle and they pull out the <reading>gui</reading>llotine (ぎ). I guess they're going to chop off your skillful fingers because they're kinda scary.
